I would like to know why i have this error.

See below what i did and the result :
Thanks,

1)unzip the junit.zip file 
add junit.jar to the CLASSPATH.
2)test the installation by using either the batch or the graphical 
TestRunner tool to run the tests that come with this release. All 
the tests should pass OK. 
2.1 )the batch TestRunner type: 
    java junit.textui.TestRunner junit.samples.AllTests
